synopsis.text: Suta Specials presented a romantic comedy featuring Makoto Kisaragi, a 15-year-old girl who feels overshadowed by her model sister. With a unique trait of a persecution complex, Makoto is determined to break free from her sister's shadow and carve her own path in high school. Despite her less-than-ideal personality, Makoto's ambition is to become popular among her peers. However, her plans take an unexpected turn when her famous sister arrives at her school. As Makoto navigates through the challenges of high school, she encounters Iriya, the most popular boy in her class. To her surprise, they become friends, marking a significant step towards her goal of popularity. Will Makoto's friendship with Iriya help her achieve her dream, or will her sister's presence continue to complicate her plans? Join Makoto on her journey of self-discovery, friendship, and high school drama in this engaging anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
